Adding lat an lon to Ana's qPCR results

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

Files

```{r}
eDNA.data <- read_csv(here("Data", "S2 Multiple fish species eDNA detection v.7.csv")) %>% 
  select(1:2, 5:12)
CTD.stations <- read_csv(file = here("Data", "cleaned_CTD_stations.csv"))

CTD.stations %>% 
  select(lat, lon, Station, Date, Time) %>% 
  distinct()-> CTD.stations

CTD.stations %>% filter (Station  =="26-2")
left_join(eDNA.data, CTD.stations, by = c('CTD cast' = "Station"),na_matches ="never") %>% 
  write_csv(here("Data", "qpCR_with_lat.csv"))
  
CTD.stations %>% 
  filter (str_detect(Station, "85"))
```
